summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4308 for the improvement of West Barton Street from 35th Avenue Southwest to 38th Avenue Southwest on the north, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51153, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
